data.title: Give in Hillsboro
data.text:
In our role of promoting and facilitating charitable giving, the Hillsboro Community Foundation is pleased to provide information on other local non-profit and charitable organizations serving the greater Hillsboro area. There are many worthy non-profit organizations in our community, and the following list is only representative. We invite you to contact them directly. If you would like your organization listed, please contact us.

ARTS, CULTURE & HERITAGE

Bag & Baggage Productions - 503.345.9590 / www.bagnbaggage.org

Glenn & Viola Walters Cultural Arts Center (not a 501c3) - 503.615.3485 / www.hillsboro-oregon.gov/HillsboroArts

Oregon Chorale - 503.926.8033 / www.oregonchorale.org

Hillsboro Artists' Regional Theatre - 503.693.7815 / www.hart-theatre.org

Hillsboro Historical Society (not a 501c3) - 503.640.6936 / www.hillsborohistorical.org

Hillsboro Symphony Orchestra - 503.539.5013 / www.hillsborosymphony.org

Hillsboro Community Youth Choir - 503.441.1357 / www.hillsborocommunityyouthchoir.org

Right Brain Initiative - 503.823.5111 / www.therightbraininitiative.org/about-the-right-brain-initiative

Sequoia Gallery & Studios - 503.693.0401 / www.sequoiagallerystudios.org

STAGES Performing Arts Youth Academy /503.270.1869 / www.stagesyouth.org

Washington County Museum - 503.645.5353 / www.washingtoncountymuseum.org

Westside Community & Youth Orchestra / 503.819.9662 / www.wcyo.org

Centro Cultural - 503.359.0446 / www.centrocultural.org

Pacific University - 503-352-2211 / www.pacificu.edu

http://www.pcc.edu/foundation

Jackson Bottom Wetlands Preserve - 503.681.6206 / www.jacksonbottom.org

SOLVE - 503.844.9571 / www.solveoregon.org

Tualatin River Keepers - 503.218.2580 / www.tualatinriverkeepers.org
